reviews.review: Now! I'm less than half a lifetime. Thanks!

Even though this game is pretty old by now, it still looks decent. The AI is a lot smarter than other games I've played. Cool weapons. And I mean... it's Half Life 2. It's fun would recommend buying. 9.7/10

muito divertido e inovador pra epoca mas ate hoje e muito divertido
it's very giving, it's giving very much

La secuela de Half-Life (1998) es más que un juego. Es una experiencia, una aventura, es algo que todo gamer debería experimentar alguna vez.

Decir que Half-Life 2 es una obra maestra es quedarse corto. Este shooter en primera persona de ciencia ficción distópica con ligeras trazas de terror y conducción es uno de los programas más influyentes de la industria, y de él beben tantos juegos a día de hoy que sería imposible nombrarlos todos.

Los pocos errores que se le pueden buscar son la falta de IA de algunos NPCs (algo entendible para la época) y el desmedido aumento de dificultad en según que zonas. Fuera de esas nimiedades, Half-Life 2 es una compra obligatoria para todo aquel jugador que se digne de serlo.
Легендарная игра. Трушным геймерам обязательна к прохождению
played it again after not playing it for a more then a year
Gra w dobrym stylu. Gra legenda. Tylko grać!

Honestly, played the first half life and it was ok, but this one is amazing. Very different forms of gameplay, ideas, a lot of cool enviroments and pretty nice graphics. A really great evolution of the first game and a very enjoyable gameplay and graphics still on 2021.
Ахуенная игра, больше не знаю что сказать
this is a great game with good gameplay and story. 100% recommended

I wasn't as big on the Half Life series as everyone else but I can definitely see the appeal and had a good time. The game is an essential for every steam library and I feel like if you have an account then you owe it to yourself to pick up at least HL2 or just save yourself some time and grab the orange box. Definitely enjoyed my playthrough.
This game is the best game I have ever played.

not nearly as memorable as its predecessor. just feels like a bland attempt at making a game look like an action movie. it probably succeeded in that aspect for a lot of people, but it just feels extremely shallow in comparison to the first one. just play hl1, man

Now this is half-life It really open the story and explain a lot more to me about what is going on with the world and that 7 hour war was quite interesting.

I just cant enjoy this game. Too many things have gone wrong in my first play through to make it enjoyable. the boat and car levels both went on far to long in my opinion and then the glitch where Alyx refuses to move ruined it all. I can see how this is an amazing game, but I am not enjoying it.
This game brings back so many memories from playing this back in the day on the original xbox. Oh the nostalgia, but for real this game is amazing.

Как еб-oшить под баян на скорости света гайд - Для начала развернитесь на 180 градусов на ровной поверхности(спиной в сторону которой вы хотите прыгать) Затем прыгните и присядьте, не отпускайте кнопку присяда и попадайте в тайминг прыжков. (Ставьте бинд прыжка на колесико, вам же будет проще bind mwheeldown "+jump"
Нужно вводить в консоль, а консоль открывается на клавишу тильда или Ё,
если консоль не открывается нужно зайти в настройки-клавиатура-дополнительно-включить консоль разработчика.

THIS GAME... fuckin A.
I got this on sale for like £1.50, then got the VALVe bundle for £8 (usually £99), but I'd have payed full price because it is worth every penny.

Half life taştır.Half life 2 daha daştır.(TKAfrodit)
Sonuç olarak Half Life 2, hem FPS oyunları arasından hemde tüm oyunlar arasından bulabileceğiniz en iyi oyunlardan bir tanesi. Oynayın oynattırın, ama ilk oyununu oynayın önce. Valve'a bize bu güzel oyunu armağan ettiği için teşekkür etmek isterdim ama kardeşim Half Life 3 nerde kaldı be. Beklemekten bırakın ağaç olmayı kökümüzü betona saldık bu ne arkadaş ya nerde şu oyunu çıkartın artık salın bizi ya.
Gaben abi at şuraya bi half life 3 severiz her türü oyanarız.pc açmazsa kredi çeker alırz:D

tabikide 2004-2010 oyunları daha güzeldir:D
